item.title: Understanding Who We Are Brings Self-Respect
item.description:
Understanding Who We Are Brings Self-Respect by President Harold B. Lee, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 143rd Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 1973
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
